subject: Consolidate legacy / home with /chat dashboard shell
description: App router has duplicate chat experiences: / renders Header/Sidebar/ChatContainer (legacy) while /chat uses the dashboard layout + different chat page. This causes inconsistent UX and auth behavior. Decide on canonical entry (likely /chat) and redirect / (and possibly /dashboard) to it, or migrate components under (dashboard). Files: packages/web/src/app/page.tsx:1-18, packages/web/src/app/(dashboard)/chat/page.tsx:1-248.
